title: Financial Modeling for Startups
description: Learn to build realistic financial projections, understand your unit economics, and communicate financial health to investors and partners.

title: Digital Marketing on a Budget
description: Practical strategies for reaching customers through social media, WhatsApp Business, and local partnerships without breaking the bank.

title: Building High-Performing Teams
description: Workshop on hiring, managing, and retaining talented staff in the DRC context. Covered compensation strategies, performance management, and company culture.

title: Legal Basics for Congolese Entrepreneurs
description: Understanding business registration, contracts, intellectual property, and compliance requirements in the DRC.
